DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate safety intravenous tPA patient wake symptom acute stroke present ED within 4.5 hour awaken , meet standard criterion treatment IV tPA acute stroke . The hypothesis patient wake stroke symptom may develop stroke time awaken , may within 4.5 hour window arrive ED within time , therefore IV tPA safe effective population .
DOC.criteria: Age great equal 18 year . Signs symptom acute ischemic stroke . Symptoms present upon awaken . Arriving Emergency Department within 4.5 hour awaken . Treatment IV rtPA must initiate prior 4.5hours waking . NIHSS > 3 A noncontrast head CT without hemorrhage without hypodensity 1/3 MCA territory ; MRI demonstrate hemorrhage , DWI lesion great 70mL FLAIR without well define hyperintense lesion 1/3 MCA territory . Premorbid modify Rankin score 0 1 . Rapidly improve deficit NIHSS le 3 . Sustained systolic blood pressure great 185mmHg diastolic blood pressure great 110mmHg despite treatment . Glucose le 50mg/dL . Stroke head trauma within last 3 month . History intracranial hemorrhage . Symptoms subarachnoid hemorrhage . Major surgery within 14 day . GI/GU hemorrhage within 21 day . INR > 1.7 . Heparin within 48 hour elevate aPTT . Platelet count less 100,000 . Presumed septic embolus suspicion bacterial endocarditis . Suspicion aortic dissection . Use anticoagulants dabigatran , rivaroxaban , apixaban , enoxaparin . Pregnant lactating woman . Known allergy sensitivity rtPA .
